Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Castle's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point during the outbreak, Castle joined a community in Ohio. Castle and Alves pull Rosita and Daryl away from their assignment to investigate a herd of walkers on the north perimeter. Sebastian joins them and orders Daryl and Rosita to retrieve a stash of money hidden in a house on the other side of the herd. Daryl's group meets up with Castle and Alves and learns that Sebastian has already sent 30 or 40 people to search for the money. Mercer shoots Castle and Alves dead after learning of their atrocities.
Death[]: Killed By Sebastian Milton (Indirectly Caused) Himself (Caused) Michael Mercer Due to having sacrificed 30-40 Commonwealth civilians in order to get money for Sebastian, he was shot in the head by Michael.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Castle has killed: April Martens (Caused) Himself (Caused) 30 to 40 unnamed Commonwealth residents (Caused) Numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: For reasons unknown, Castle and Alves were excluded from the "In Memoriam" segment on Talking Dead for " The Rotten Core ".
